name: Vitale #20
description: Your 1.01 carat oval brilliant cut natural diamond is a remarkable gemstone with specific attributes that contribute to its beauty and value. Its VVS1 clarity, very very small inclusions, is combined with a rare white G colour, resulting in a captivating sparkle accentuated by its precise cut. Impeccably graded and crafted, this diamond promises timeless beauty and investment potential.
